QGIS algorithm Remove small pixel clumps (to no-data)

Source: R/saga_removesmallpixelclumpstonodata.R
saga_removesmallpixelclumpstonodata.Rd

QGIS Algorithm provided by SAGA Remove small pixel clumps (to no-data) (saga:removesmallpixelclumpstonodata)

saga_removesmallpixelclumpstonodata(
  GRID = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  THRESHOLD = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  OUTPUT = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  ...,
  .complete_output = TRUE
)

Arguments

GRID

raster - Input Grid. Path to a raster layer.
THRESHOLD

number - Min. Size. A numeric value.
OUTPUT

rasterDestination - Filtered Grid. Path for new raster layer.
...

further parameters passed to qgisprocess::qgis_run_algorithm()
.complete_output

logical specifing if complete out of qgisprocess::qgis_run_algorithm() should be used (TRUE) or first output (most likely the main) should read (FALSE). Default value is TRUE.

Details

Outputs description

  • OUTPUT - outputRaster - Filtered Grid
